data.title: Sky Tower
data.meta_description: Experience 34  stories of elegance and excellence at Mohegan Sun's own, Sky Tower. Truly a perfect retreat, treat yourself to a luxury unlike any other just a short distance from the center of Mohegan Sun fun. Book today!
data.text:
- Average of 894 square feet

- A bedroom with one King bed

- One and a half bathrooms

- A sit-down jetted tub (only available on select floors)

- Living room with pull-out sofa bed

- Large closet with automatic lighting

- Up to 55" flat screen television in each room

- Average of 1,145 square feet

- A bedroom with one King bed

- One and a half bathrooms

- A sit-down jetted tub

- Living room with pull-out sofa bed

- Large closet with automatic lighting

- Up to 55" flat screen television in each room

- Beautiful views

(Dining table only available on select floors)

- Average of 1,800 square feet

- A bedroom with one King bed

- One and a half bathrooms

- A Kohler brand tub with a reclining contoured back

- Living room with a built-in bar

- Conference/dining table that seats up to 10 people

- Up to 65" television

- Beautiful views

- Must be booked more than 48 hours before arrival

Each Executive Suite features 1,300 square feet of luxurious furnishings including a bedroom with plush King bed, a spacious living room featuring a full living and dining area and complete with a butler's pantry with partial kitchen. A state-of-the-art bathroom with Jacuzzi along with high-end amenities including a Bose surround sound system round out this upscale experience.

Each Presidential Suite features 2,200 square feet of luxurious furnishings including two bedrooms, each with a plush King bed, a spacious living room featuring a full living and dining area and complete with a butler's pantry with partial kitchen. The suite boasts a total of two and a half baths with a Jacuzzi along with high-end amenities including a Bose surround sound system with three televisions round out this upscale experience.

Each Royal Suite, the largest and most luxurious suite at Mohegan Sun, features 3,500 square feet of luxurious furnishings including two master bedrooms, each with a plush King bed. The first full master bathroom has a 1-person Jacuzzi tub with underwater mood lighting as well as a separate steam shower. The second full master bedroom comes with an extra-large Jacuzzi fitting up to 4 people. The spacious sitting area offers panoramic views of the Thames River. The Royal suite also comes with a butler's pantry and partial kitchen for your convenience as well as Limousine transportation to and from the hotel from Bradley or Providence airports.
